physical_appearance:This is a photograph taken in Shahdara
 Lahore. There is a water body in the foreground of the photograph. In the center
 there is a small plot of land with concrete ruins
 with only two pillars holding an archway still standing. In the background
 there is some vegetation
 and three tall towers. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph taken in Shahdara, Lahore. There is a water body in the foreground of the photograph. In the center, there is a small plot of land with concrete ruins, with only two pillars holding an archway still standing. In the background, there is some vegetation, and three tall towers. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
